moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Defense
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Prepare to Fight!
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP. Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Make It Double Sludge
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The user uses Explosion immediately before fainting.
